Dialogue.Page: The Void awates.

DialogueOption.Text: Where am I? What is this place?

Dialogue.Page: We met many times and never met before.
And now you know your destiny. You must enter in the Eye of Universe.
Otherwise only the darkness awaits you.
The Precedent is solved.

DialogueOption.Text: I understood the importance of me and my timeline.

Dialogue.Page: I can't get you back, only you can find a way out. Those are rules.
You should now think like Escall and his clan did after the warping to the Dark Bramble.
That's all I can say.
I can't get you back, only you can find a way out. Those are rules.
You should now think like Escall and his clan did after the warping to the Dark Bramble.
That's all I can say.
You don't have to. The reason you here is your timeline.
You can be sure I am not Slate. Probably it is just your enterpretation of entity observed.
My name is Enacra, but usually we have no names.
We are concerned about your condition. Certain things must happen in a cetain way â€” do not hinder.
Our worlds must never cross, but current timeline is suffering. I am here to fix this.
Your universe is not the only one, nor your form of existence. I came from the Void.

DialogueOption.Text: But our worlds would never cross!

Dialogue.Page: It is the matter of perspective. The possibility exists and it's rising by a complexity of your timeline.
You came too close, we had to intervent. We must keep the balance.
You will see the most relevant events of your own time stream.
I will show you the importance of your inevitable future.
Cross each singularity to conceive the knowledge.

DialogueOption.Text: Seems like I have no choice...

Dialogue.Page: There is always a choice. Time has stopped, if you die here you will dissolve in darkness.
Cross each singularity to conceive the knowledge.
We will meet again.
We will meet again.
Soon.
It is not a place exactly, but the time point, the static one. You are in stasis that we created.
We are concerned about your condition. Certain things must happen in a cetain way.
Your universe is not the only one, nor your form of existence.
Once you conceive the knowledge from each singularity, you will be free.
Untill then you and I will be in stasis.

DialogueOption.Text: Seems like I have no choice...

Dialogue.Page: We are concerned about your condition. Certain things must happen in a cetain way.
Once you conceive the knowledge from each singularity, you will be free.
Untill then you and I will be in stasis.
